com.estimote.sdk.cloud

Class EstimoteCloud

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.estimote.sdk.cloud.EstimoteCloud

  • public class EstimoteCloud
extends Object
    Responsible for interaction with Estimote Cloud.

    You need first to provide App id and token. You can find your App ID and App Token in the Apps section of the Estimote Cloud.

    This object is a singleton. You can obtain instance to it by calling getInstance().

    Usage: 

       EstimoteSDK.initialize(applicationContext, appId, appToken);
   EstimoteCloud.getInstance().fetchBeaconDetails("AA:BB:CC:AA:BB:CC", callback);

      • fetchBeaconDetails

        public void fetchBeaconDetails(String macAddress,
                      CloudCallback<BeaconInfo> callback)
        Fetches details of a beacon identified by its MAC address from Estimote Cloud.
        Parameters:
        macAddress - Beacon's MAC address.
        callback - Callback to be invoked after details are fetched.

      • fetchNearableDetails

        public void fetchNearableDetails(String identifier,
                        CloudCallback<NearableInfo> callback)
        Fetches details (like color or type) of a nearable from Estimote Cloud.
        Parameters:
        identifier - Nearable's identifier (Nearable.identifier).
        callback - Callback to be invoked after details are fetched.
